content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be an excellent living space. So, what is your initial offer for the rental price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 400 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my expectations. I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality of the apartment and its prime location. Are you open to increasing your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I am willing to pay 450 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Still, I believe the apartment is worth more than that. It's brand new, in the city center, and comes with all the amenities you could need. Are you sure you can't go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I am willing to pay 500 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's more like it. The apartment is worth every penny, considering the location and the facilities. Would you be willing to go a little higher to secure this place?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 525 euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 525 euros is still not enough for an apartment of this caliber. It's a steal at this price! Are you sure you can't afford to pay a bit more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am willing to pay 550 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's more like it! The apartment is truly a gem, and this price is much more in line with its value. Would you be willing to go up to 575 euros to finalize the deal?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
